Statements: Helioskrills is infection on it's head. Zombies have guns and survivors have stealth. Suvivors must assasinate zombies or hit them in the back.
Zombies are slow. Stick together and watch the corners.
As a zombie you'll need to explore the map for more ammunition.
After we lost Argent Moon, the experiments were restarted at this Oni Blacksite.
In Blacksite, switches can barricade rooms.
Use vents to sneak into barricaded rooms, or escape tricky situations.
On the mainland of Qivro, this once beautiful temple has forgotten even its own name.
Use the launch pipes to quickly ascend to the top of the map.
